trans-unit.source: Acts as a container to a group of activities that is executed when the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity" /> starts running.
trans-unit.target: Funciona como um contêiner para um grupo de atividades executado quando a execução do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity" /> é iniciada.
Essa classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> acts as a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequenceActivity> to all activities it contains.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> atua como um <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequenceActivity> para todas as atividades que ele contém.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SetStateActivity> classes may be included in the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity>.

If a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> exists in a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity>, the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> is the first activity that gets executed when the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> starts executing.
trans-unit.target: Se um <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> existe em um <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity>, o <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> é a primeira atividade obtém executado quando o <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> inicia a execução.

trans-unit.source: In some ways the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> is like an `OnEnterState` handler.
trans-unit.target: Em alguns aspectos de <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> é como uma `OnEnterState` manipulador.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> is not a mandatory activity in the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> não é uma atividade obrigatória no <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> is a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>, which means the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> can contain other activities.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> é um <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>, que significa que o <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> pode conter outras atividades.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> cannot contain any activity that implements the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IEventActivity> interface, which includes all <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity> activities and the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity> activity.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> não pode conter qualquer atividade que implementa o <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IEventActivity> interface, que inclui todos os <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity> atividades e o <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity> atividade.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> is executed in the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity>, a non-blocking manner that makes the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> ready to receive events.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> é executado no <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity>, uma maneira sem bloqueio que torna o <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> pronto para receber eventos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> can contain a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SetStateActivity> activity, so that it can model a state machine where transitions occur from state to state without receiving any event.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> pode conter um <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SetStateActivity> atividade, de forma que ele pode modelar uma máquina de estado em que ocorrem transições de estado para estado sem receber qualquer evento.

trans-unit.source: In that sense the state machine behaves like a sequential workflow.
trans-unit.target: Nesse sentido a máquina de estado se comporta como um fluxo de trabalho sequencial.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create a new instance of a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> object.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como criar uma nova instância de um <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> objeto.

trans-unit.source: This example is from the State Initialization SDK sample.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo é da amostra do SDK de inicialização de estado.
Para obter mais informações, consulte [estado inicialização exemplo](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9053202f-2567-4428-a4a2-85423963646b).

trans-unit.source: The user-defined name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: O nome da atividade definido pelo usuário.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity" /> class using the name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity" /> usando o nome da atividade.
